Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3162 affecting package prometheus-adapter for versions less than 0.10.0-17
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-3162 affecting package prometheus-adapter for versions less than 0.10.0-17. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package prometheus-adapter is earlier than 0.10.0-17, affected by CVE-2022-3162
